meanings.definition: Very high or tall in stature.
meanings.sent1: The towering tree provided shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: The towering skyscraper dominated the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The towering giraffe tried to hide behind a bush, but its head still stuck out.
meanings.sent4: Her towering presence in the room made everyone turn to look.
meanings.sent5: The towering mountain peak was covered in snow, glistening in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: His towering reputation in the field of science earned him many awards.
meanings.sent2: The towering decision to invest in the new technology paid off handsomely.
meanings.sent3: The towering book on the shelf caught the attention of all the readers.
meanings.sent4: Her towering speech at the conference inspired many to take action.
meanings.sent5: The towering achievement of landing on the moon marked a significant moment in history.

meanings.sent1: The towering waves crashed against the shore during the storm.
meanings.sent2: The towering flames engulfed the old building in seconds.
meanings.sent3: The towering fountain in the park sprayed water in all directions, soaking everyone nearby.
meanings.sent4: Her towering hairdo made her easy to spot in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The towering smoke from the factory chimney darkened the sky.
